questions.question: In Youngâ€™s Double Slit Experiment, if instead of monochromatic light white light is used, what would be the observation?

answers.a: The pattern will not be visible
answers.b: The shape of the pattern will change from hyperbolic to circular
answers.c: Colored fringes will be observed with a white bright fringe at the center
answers.d: The bright and dark fringes will change position

explanations.c: Explanation 2. You can find more details here.
